nodes.text: Macy Yakaro was a male fringer who operated as a guide out of Salfur's Trading Post on the Forest Moon of Endor, and was fond of cigarras. He used to work on the planet Annaj as a spaceport controller, where he learned the frequencies the Zorbian space pirates used on the Skewer, their ship. When a group came to Endor to track the Skewer and some of its precious and stolen cargo, Yakaro offered his services, for a fee.

Macy Yakaro appeared in the Race for the Tessent article in Star Wars Gamer 9, which was released on March 1, 2002. The players do not need to use his services, but he increases their chances of finding the Skewer sooner. Hpwever, the longer it takes to find the Skewer increases his chances of disappearing, and ending up on a tribe of banished Ewok's cooking spit.
